articles.author: Paula Andrés
articles.title: Poland reaches deal with farmers to call off blockade of Ukraine border crossing - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The agreement meets farmers’ demands for financial compensation but doesn’t include restrictions on Ukrainian imports.
articles.content: Polish farmers ended a blockade of a Poland-Ukraine border crossing after reaching an agreement with Warsaw that met their demands, defusing a dispute that had become an early test of the new governm… [+2358 chars]
